languages.text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как меч тянет вас к земле своей непомерной тяжестью. Еще мгновение вы сопротивляетесь его воле — а затем валитесь на пол под аккомпанемент злобного хохота. Кажется, вес меча вот-вот сломает вам спину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как меч тянет вас к земле своей непомерной тяжестью. Еще мгновение вы сопротивляетесь его воле — а затем валитесь на пол под аккомпанемент злобного хохота. Кажется, тяжесть меча вот-вот сломает вам спину...{/n}

languages.text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы чувствуете, как меч тянет вас к земле своей непомерной тяжестью. Еще мгновение вы сопротивляетесь его воле — а затем валитесь на пол под аккомпанемент злобного хохота. Кажется, вес меча вот-вот сломает вам спину.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You feel the sword pulling you to the ground with its gigantic weight. You resist its will for a moment, and then fall down in the sound of the evil laugh. It seems like weight of the sword is about to break your back.{/n}

{n}You feel the sword pulling you to the ground with its gigantic weight. You resist its will for a moment, and then fall down in the sound of the evil laugh. It seems like weight of the sword is about to break your back.{/n}

{n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. It feels like the weight of the sword is about to break your back.{/n}

{n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. It feels like the weight of the sword is about to break your back.{/n}

{n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感觉到无比沉重的利刃将你扯倒在地。在可憎的笑声中，你又勉力支撑了一会儿，随后倒在了地上。这把剑实在是太重了，你感觉你的脊背都快被压断了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉到无比沉重的利刃将你扯倒在地。在可憎的笑声中，你又勉力支撑了一会儿，随后倒在了地上。这把剑实在是太重了，你感觉你的脊背都快被压断了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez le poids colossal de la lame s'abattre sur votre corps. Vous résistez quelques instants, avant de vous effondrer au sol tandis qu'un rire odieux résonne dans votre esprit. La pression est telle que vous avez l'impression que votre colonne risque de céder d'un instant à l'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez le poids colossal de la lame s'abattre sur votre corps. Vous résistez quelques instants, avant de vous effondrer au sol tandis qu'un rire odieux résonne dans votre esprit. La pression est telle que vous avez l'impression que votre colonne risque de céder d'un instant à l'autre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは剣の巨大な重さに引き落されるのを感じる。しばし剣の意志に抵抗してみるものの、体は地面に崩れ落ち、醜悪な笑い声が響く。まるで今にも剣の重さに押しつぶされそうだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは剣の巨大な重さに引き落されるのを感じる。しばし剣の意志に抵抗してみるものの、体は地面に崩れ落ち、醜悪な笑い声が響く。まるで今にも剣の重さに押しつぶされそうだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sientes que el inmenso peso de la espada te arrastra hacia abajo. Te resistes a su voluntad por un momento antes de caer al suelo, rodead{mf|o|a} de una risa espantosa. La presión es tan intensa que amenaza con romperte la espalda en cualquier momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes que el inmenso peso de la espada te arrastra hacia abajo. Te resistes a su voluntad por un momento antes de caer al suelo, rodead{mf|o|a} de una risa espantosa. La presión es tan intensa que amenaza con romperte la espalda en cualquier momento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst, wie das immense Gewicht des Schwertes dich hinabzieht. Du widersetzt dich seinem Willen noch einen Augenblick lang, bevor du dann zum Klang abscheulichen Gelächters auf dem Boden zusammenbrichst. Es fühlt sich an, als würde das Gewicht des Schwertes dir das Rückgrat brechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. It feels like the weight of the sword is about to break your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst, wie das immense Gewicht des Schwertes dich hinabzieht. Du widersetzt dich seinem Willen noch einen Augenblick lang, bevor du dann zum Klang abscheulichen Gelächters auf dem Boden zusammenbrichst. Es fühlt sich an, als würde das Gewicht des Schwertes dir das Rückgrat brechen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kılıcın muazzam ağırlığının seni aşağı çektiğini hissediyorsun. Biraz daha iradesine direnip iğrenç kahkahalar eşliğinde yere yığılıyorsun. Öyle zorlanıyorsun ki her an belinin kırılabileceğinden korkuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel the sword's immense weight pulling you down. You resist its will for a moment longer before collapsing to the ground to the sound of odious laughter. The strain is such that you fear your back could break at any moment.{/n}
